Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Kensington Rooms in London (Kensington), you'll be minutes from Kensington Roof Gardens and Imperial College London. This family-friendly hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 88 guestrooms. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Kensington Rooms in London (Kensington), you'll be minutes from Kensington Roof Gardens and Imperial College London. This family-friendly hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kensington Roof Gardens - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
London Natural History Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Imperial College London - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
London Science Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Albert Memorial - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Brompton Oratory - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Kensington Gardens - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Holland Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Beauchamp Place - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Stamford Bridge Stadium - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Harrods - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 16.4 km / 10.2 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi

The preferred airport for Kensington Rooms is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
